title: v1.0.2
items: Implemented additional checks to avoid deaths
Checks include Sign of life, run energy, divine charges
Ability to use Undead Slayer sigil for encounters with Linza

title: v1.0.2
items: Should no longer get stuck at the rope if it fails to create a path.
Simplified some queries to reduce workload.
If at Barrows with all brothers already killed, will now head back into the tunnel.
Will now kill brothers in the tunnel while navigating, rather than just at the chest.
